Stellar Mercury 002 LTD Custom 3 – White The Factory Direct Music difference Manufacturer direct savings 30-Day money back guarantee 5-year warranty We love our customers! All guitars are professionally setup in-house prior to shipping by our resident guitar luthier who brings his knowledge from his time working as a PRS neck-specialist in Maryland to your guitar today Florida-based family-owned musical instrument distributor, since 2001 Condition and Comments · Pre-owned: This guitar has minor oxidation on the bridge components as well as the screws and toggle switch parts. If anything, this gives the guitar a vintage look, but does not affect playability of the guitar. Besides, the cosmetic blemishes this guitar looks excellent. This is such an amazing guitar! The guitar comes made out of a mahogany body. The neck is also a mahogany set neck. It also has a dark rosewood fretboard. The body and neck of this guitar is painted a creamy vintage white that looks tremendous against the gold plated pickups. The body is wrapped in a multiply binding as well as the headstock. The neck is a singleply binding. The fretboard is rich and dark which gives an excellent contrast to the shine of the highly detailed pearloid inlays. This guitar has two Stellar NSR humbucker pickups. These pickups give the guitar long sustains that sound excellent with a classic tone that is exactly what you would expect from this kind of guitar. The D-Shape slimline neck is as fast as you are. The medium jumbo frets are shiny, professionally crowned & leveled by hand. Specs Body: Mahogany body, multiply binding, polyurethane clear finish Neck: 24.75” scale, D-Shape profile neck, 1 11/16” nut, polyurethane clear finish Fretboard: Dark rosewood, medium jumbo frets, pearloid Inlays, singleply binding Headstock: Angled headstock, painted black on face, multiply binding Electronics: x2 Stellar NRZ humbucker pickups, 2x volume knob, 2x tone knob, 3-way toggle switch Hardware: Stoptail bridge, diecast tuners, chrome hardware MER002LTD-WHT2
Title: Stellar Mercury 002 LTD Custom 3 – White, Singlecut Archtop Electric Guitar
ConditionDescription: Pre-owned: This guitar has minor oxidation on the bridge components as well as the screws and toggle switch parts.  If anything, this gives the guitar a vintage look, but does not affect playability of the guitar.  Besides, the cosmetic blemishes this guitar looks excellent.
